author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-3932 [drlvm][class_support] Known/proven race conditions markup at vm\vmcore\src\class_support\Class.cpp at is_instanceof()

author: tv
msg: Use the security api 1.0.8-dev all over the place.

author: jmsnell
msg: The next draft of the APP spec (15) changes the Slug header to use pct-encoding instead of RFC2047.
This update accepts RFC2047 and pct-encoded headers, but makes it so that only pct-encoded headers are produced.
Also, throw an error when the forbidden LF and CR characters are used in the slug.
